articles.author: Susie Violet Ward
articles.title: German Lawmaker Demands Strategic Overhaul Amid Bitcoin Sell-Off Chaos - Forbes
articles.description: The German government recently intensified its bitcoin sell-off, followed by a surprising buyback, highlighting the chaos in their bitcoin strategy.
articles.content: 27 April 2023, Berlin: Joana Cotar (independent) speaks at the 100th session of the German ... [+] Bundestag. The debate is about the further development of skilled labor immigration. Photo: Jörg Car… [+3557 chars]

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.title: Past vs. Present — Examining Bitcoin's History of Bull Market Corrections – Featured Bitcoin News - Bitcoin.com News
articles.description: As of now, the price of bitcoin has decreased by 23.4% from its peak of $73,737, reached on March 14, 2024, about four months ago.
